content: hey, given that in another thread we've been mentioning things that we would love to document
that's interesting and I'm pretty sure that there's plenty of info about that in chats, etc
I'm the kind of person that prefers something not polished over nothing in the docs, my guess is that polishing stuff may stop some people from adding useful information

Santiago Pastorino said:

https://rustc-dev-guide.rust-lang.org/queries/incremental-compilation-in-detail.html#shortcomings-of-the-current-system

in this particular case, if people remember where can we find information about this, we could start collecting and polishing something maybe, I meant, other than those 2 already there ...
